EmailTemplate.description: The email response for completing the SOI Declare form.
EmailTemplate.name: State of Independence.SOI - Declare
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on your Declaration of Independence!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Congratulations on declaring your career independence! Weâ€™d like to welcome you into the ever-growing group of workers <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents.html> in America who identify themselves as independents. Our goal at MBO Partners is to support your journey and to help you celebrate your successes along the way.
If you would like to learn more about the services MBO Partners provides independent consultants and contractors, please call us at 800-220-0469, email us at info@mbopartners.com or visit our web site at www.mbopartners.com. We look forward to hearing from you.
Best Regards,
MBO Partners
